SEARCH
Package org.eclipse.mcp.experimental.annotated

Annotation Interface MCPAnnotatedToolFactory.Tool

Enclosing class:
MCPAnnotatedToolFactory
@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) @Documented public static @interface MCPAnnotatedToolFactory.Tool
Tool Schema Reference

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String
    description
    This can be used by clients to improve the LLM's understanding of available tools.
    String
    title
    A human-readable title for the tool.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    boolean
    destructiveHint
    If true, the tool may perform destructive updates to its environment.
    boolean
    idempotentHint
    If true, calling the tool repeatedly with the same arguments will have no additional effect on the its environment.
    String
    inputSchema
    A JSON Schema object defining the expected parameters for the tool.
    String
    name
    Intended for programmatic or logical use, but used as a display name in past specs or fallback (if title isn't present).
    boolean
    openWorldHint
    If true, this tool may interact with an "open world" of external entities.
    String
    outputSchema
    An optional JSON Schema object defining the structure of the tool's output returned in the structuredContent field of a CallToolResult.
    boolean
    readOnlyHint
    If true, the tool does not modify its environment.
    boolean
    returnDirect
     

  • Element Details

    • name

      String name
      Intended for programmatic or logical use, but used as a display name in past specs or fallback (if title isn't present).
      Default:
      ""

    • description

      String description
      This can be used by clients to improve the LLM's understanding of available tools. It can be thought of like a "hint" to the model.

    • inputSchema

      String inputSchema
      A JSON Schema object defining the expected parameters for the tool.
      Default:
      ""

    • outputSchema

      String outputSchema
      An optional JSON Schema object defining the structure of the tool's output returned in the structuredContent field of a CallToolResult.
      Default:
      ""

    • title

      String title
      A human-readable title for the tool. Display name precedence order is: title, annotations.title, then name.

    • readOnlyHint

      boolean readOnlyHint
      If true, the tool does not modify its environment.
      Default:
      false

    • destructiveHint

      boolean destructiveHint
      If true, the tool may perform destructive updates to its environment. If false, the tool performs only additive updates. (This property is meaningful only when `readOnlyHint == false`)
      Default:
      true

    • idempotentHint

      boolean idempotentHint
      If true, calling the tool repeatedly with the same arguments will have no additional effect on the its environment. (This property is meaningful only when `readOnlyHint == false`) Default: false
      Default:
      false

    • openWorldHint

      boolean openWorldHint
      If true, this tool may interact with an "open world" of external entities. If false, the tool's domain of interaction is closed. For example, the world of a web search tool is open, whereas that of a memory tool is not. Default: true
      Default:
      false

    • returnDirect

      boolean returnDirect
      Default:
      false
